name: Tornado Shaped Slippers
data: It increases the users intelligence unnoticably.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unnoticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unnoticably.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
They allow you to fly for some time. But nobody knows how to recharge the
